subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: All those critics who said that Kansas City overpaid for Gil Meche may be hard to find now. In his first start since signing a five-year, $55 million contract, Meche outdueled Curt Schilling yesterday and pitched the host Royals to a 7-1 victory against the Boston Red Sox on opening day.
